title: Open string - BMN operator correspondence in the weak coupling regime
abstract: We reproduce the correspondence between open string states |n> and BMN operators O_n in N=2 supersymmetric gauge theory using a worldsheet computation with the relation =O_n, where and obtain a chiral operator and BMN operators, respectively, in correspondence to them. Because we take the coupling constant to be weak and the background spacetime to be flat Minkowski, not AdS, the string states |n> are circular waves around the D3-branes, instead of KK modes on S^5. We also discuss the 1/J correction to the correspondence.
